Actions.ActionName: ALFRED - We run the CopySelect utility
Actions.Text: tell application id "com.runningwithcrayons.Alfred" to run trigger "copySelect" in workflow "com.superwhisper.aft"

Actions.ActionName: YABAI - Always make window visible when starting or ending rec
